subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Tony Martin leads Chris Froome by 12 seconds and Tejay Van Garderen by 25 after a rainy day in which there was seven crashes.
snippet: Tony Martin leads Chris Froome by 12 seconds and Tejay Van Garderen by 25 after a rainy day in which there was seven crashes.
